name: Alex Chen
bio: With over 8 years of experience in game development, Alex leads our technical vision and ensures our games push the boundaries of what's possible in indie gaming. Previously worked at AAA studios before co-founding Atlas Games to pursue creative freedom.
achievements: Led development of Harvest Hustle to 50k+ downloads
Optimized game performance by 40% across all titles

name: Chris Wilson
bio: Chris ensures our games meet the highest quality standards. Their attention to detail and passion for polish helps us deliver bug-free, enjoyable experiences. With extensive experience in both manual and automated testing, Chris maintains the quality that Atlas Games is known for.
achievements: Reduced bug reports by 60% through improved testing processes
Implemented automated testing suite saving 20+ hours per release
Certified in multiple QA methodologies and tools

name: Emma Thompson
bio: Emma creates the soundscapes that bring our games to life. From atmospheric music to satisfying sound effects, she ensures audio enhances every moment. Her background in both music composition and sound engineering brings depth to every audio experience.
achievements: Composed award-winning soundtrack for Honey Haven
Created dynamic audio system used across all studio games
Featured composer in Game Audio Network Guild

name: Jordan Kim
bio: Jordan's artistic expertise spans from concept art to final polish. They create the visual worlds that make our games memorable and immersive experiences. With a background in both traditional and digital art, Jordan ensures every pixel serves the game's vision.
achievements: Created the distinctive art style for Tiny Cafe
Designed over 200 game assets across multiple projects
Featured artist in IndieArt Monthly magazine

name: Maya Rodriguez
bio: Maya brings stories to life through compelling game design and artistic vision. Her background in narrative design ensures every Atlas game has heart and purpose. She believes games should create lasting emotional connections with players.
achievements: Designed award-winning narrative for Harvest Hustle
Created design frameworks used across all studio projects
Published articles on inclusive game design

name: Sam Patel
bio: Sam crafts the mechanics and systems that make our games fun and engaging. Their focus on player experience ensures every interaction feels meaningful. With expertise in both systems design and user psychology, Sam creates gameplay loops that keep players coming back.
achievements: Designed core mechanics for Kenny's Khaos
Improved player retention by 35% through design iterations
Speaker at 3 indie game development conferences
